# JBL vs Bose vs Beats | Best Portable Bluetooth Speakers 2020

![JBL vs Bose vs Beats | Best Portable Bluetooth Speakers
2020](https://i0.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/JBL-Charge-4-Best-Portable-Bluetooth-
Speaker.jpg?fit=1500%2C750&ssl=1)

#1 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker - JBL Charge 4

[
![](https://i2.wp.com/media.go2speed.org/brand/files/hempoffers/72/20190823111516-Banner_Gummies_728x90_Recovery_Static.jpg?w=728&ssl=1)](https://track.revoffers.com/aff_c?offer_id=72&aff_id=4960&file_id=942&url_id=100)

### Share This On...

__ Share on facebook

__ Share on twitter

__ Share on pinterest

__ Share on reddit

__ Share on email

[
![](https://www.ftjcfx.com/image-9115041-13465292)](https://www.dpbolvw.net/click-9115041-13465292)

When it comes to the Best Portable Bluetooth Speakers and Headphones, JBL has
always had one of the most consistent reputations. The JBL Charge 4 was
released back in the summer of 2019, and JBL has easily retained command of
the portable audio industry. The previous JBL Charge models have been so good
that they only get knocked out of 1st place by the next Charge model and this
year is no different.

While we wait for Beats and Bose to answer with comparable models, we have the
2 best alternatives to the JBL Charge 4. The Beats Pill+ and the Bose
SoundLink Revolve+ give JBL a run-for-their-money, and in more than one way.
Before we get to that, let’s take a quick look at what’s new with the JBL
Charge 4 first.

## 1\. JBL Charge 4

### Portable Bluetooth Speaker

[ ![#1 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: JBL Charge 4 Review - Superior Digital
News](https://i2.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/JBL-Charge-4-Portable-Bluetooth-
Speaker.jpg?fit=1024%2C475&ssl=1) ](https://amzn.to/30aR3f2) #1 Best Portable
Bluetooth Speaker: JBL Charge 4 Review

[ __ See on Amazon.com ](https://amzn.to/30aR3f2)

> _**20 Hours of playback**_

## PROS:

  * WHAT’S NEW! Improved bass response and more power (30 Watts)
  * 20 Hours of playback (huge battery – 7,800mAh) 
  * 10+ Colors to choose from: Black, Blue, Grey, Green, Pink, Red, Mustard, White, Teal, Gold, and Camouflage
  * Pair 2 Charge 4’s for stereo playback or…
  * Connect up to 100 other JBL connect+ compatible speakers for multi-room and indoor-outdoor playback
  * **USB Charge Port Power Output;** Charges your phone, vape, ecig, or other small electronic devices
  * IPX7 Waterproof and floats so you don’t lose it if it goes overboard
  * Super-durable fabric and rubber housing

## CONS:

  * JBL Companion app needs expanded EQ functionality. _For a portable speaker that’s used in many different settings, it would be nice to have more BUILT-IN adjustments._
  * No mic for speaker calls

## Conclusion

If you want the all-around best portable Bluetooth speaker, then the [_JBL
Charge 4_](https://amzn.to/2NqeTNg) is it. It’s big sound and a big battery,
but packed in a compact and durable waterproof shell. With the 10+ color
options being merely icing on the cake, there are endless ways to
_[accessorize](https://amzn.to/2QzGiPp)_ the Charge 4 Bluetooth Speaker Series
too.  

[ ![#1 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: JBL Charge 4 Review - Superior Digital
News](https://i2.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/JBL-Charge-4-Portable-Bluetooth-Speaker-Black-Charges-
Your-Phone-1.jpg?fit=1024%2C853&ssl=1) ](https://amzn.to/34R2W8O) Charge your
Phone, vape, ecig, or other portable electronic devices

[ __ See on Amazon.com ](https://amzn.to/30aR3f2)

![Superior Digital News | News, Reviews, and Deals on the best technology for
health, fitness, and fun](https://i2.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/06/Divider-SHORT-Circuit-Lines-SD-
News-3-07.png?fit=1024%2C17&ssl=1)

## 2\. Beats Pill+

### Portable Bluetooth Speaker

[ ![#2 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: Beats Pill+ Review - Superior Digital
News](https://i0.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/Beats-Pill-Portable-Speaker-White-Controls-and-
Features.jpg?fit=1024%2C510&ssl=1) ](https://amzn.to/30qJmwR) #2 Best Portable
Bluetooth Speaker: Beats Pill+

[ __ See on Amazon.com ](https://amzn.to/30qJmwR)

> _**12 Hours of playback**_

## PROS:

  * 12 Hours of playback (slightly longer than average)
  * 3 Colors to choose from: Black, Red, White
  * **USB Charge Port Power Output;** Charge your phone, vape, ecig, or other small electronic devices
  * Low profile design and fairly durable chassis
  * Lighting Cable charging connection (iPhone user-friendly)

## CONS:

  * **Not Waterproof (Get with the program Dre!)**
  * Extended bass frequency is good for pop and hip hop music but can make other genres sound “muddy”
  * Battery life is so-so, especially if you use it to charge your phone and other devices

## Conclusion

What the [_Beats Pill+_](https://amzn.to/30fK3hm) lacks in battery life and
sound quality, it makes up in portability and compatibility. Since Apple
bought Beats over 5 years ago, they’ve done a great job of only aligning
specific features to the Apple environment.

Before the merger, Apple and [_Beats_](https://amzn.to/2Ohkrtf) already had 2
things in common. Their products were some of the best in their industry, but
they’re also a little overpriced. In the end, their minimalist design style
and dedication to high quality products are two reasons it’s a match made in
heaven. **With the switch to an Apple Lightning charger connection, the Beats
Pill+ fits right into the Apple users environment.**

Now that the price is below $125 on Amazon, in our opinion, it’s the best
option for Apple-lovers on-the-go. No, it’s not as tough as the Charge 4 and
it doesn’t sound as good as the Bose SoundLink Revolve+. It’s the compact
size, compared to the BIG sound that makes it the perfect travel buddy.

[ ![#2 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: Beats Pill+ Review - Superior Digital
News](https://i1.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/Beats-Pill-Portable-Speaker.jpg?fit=1024%2C557&ssl=1)
](https://amzn.to/30qJmwR) #2 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: Beats Pill+

[ __ See on Amazon.com ](https://amzn.to/30qJmwR)

![Superior Digital News | News, Reviews, and Deals on the best technology for
health, fitness, and fun](https://i2.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/06/Divider-SHORT-Circuit-Lines-SD-
News-3-07.png?fit=1024%2C17&ssl=1)

[
![](https://www.lduhtrp.net/image-9115023-14079933)](https://www.anrdoezrs.net/click-9115023-14079933)

![Superior Digital News | News, Reviews, and Deals on the best technology for
health, fitness, and fun](https://i2.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/06/Divider-SHORT-Circuit-Lines-SD-
News-3-07.png?fit=1024%2C17&ssl=1)

## 3\. Bose SoundLink Revolve+

### Portable Bluetooth Speaker

[ ![#3 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: Bose Soundlink Revolve+ Review -
Superior Digital News](https://i1.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/Bose-Soundlink-Revolve-Portable-Bluetooth-Speaker-
Easy-Carry-Handle.jpg?fit=1024%2C681&ssl=1) ](https://amzn.to/31xlTLO) #3 Best
Portable Bluetooth Speaker: Bose SoundLink Revolve+

[ __ See on Amazon.com ](https://amzn.to/32RYDZ3)

> _**16 Hours of playback**_

## PROS:

  * 16 Hours of playback
  * Best all-around sound quality; 360° immersive sound
  * IPX Water-resistant
  * Pair 2 for stereo playback or mono for multi-room playback
  * Simple, elegant and tough design
  * Comes with Revolve Charging Cradle so it always stays “topped off” and ready to go

## CONS:

  * **No USB port to charge your phone, vape, ecig, or other small electronic devices**
  * **Most expensive** , but is well worth the investment in sound-quality alone
  * Only 2 colors to choose!

## Conclusion

We all know Bose is king when it comes to studio and home audio products. When
it comes to [_portable Bluetooth speakers_](https://amzn.to/2LEizc7), in
particular, they haven’t been as consistent though. From weird color options
to durability issues, they’ve dropped the ball a few times over the years. We
find it funny that instead of finding better colors options for their latest
SoundLink models, they just avoided offering colors altogether. _#SMH_  
  
The [_Bose SoundLink Revolve+_](https://amzn.to/30wD66s) was instantly one of
our top 3 choices back in 2017 when it was released. Now it remains mainly
because there’s still no MID-SIZE portable Bluetooth speaker that sounds
better. Even though you only have a choice between Triple Black and Lux Gray,
the jaw-dropping sound quality is what really makes them stand out.

[ ![#3 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: Bose Soundlink Revolve+ Review -
Superior Digital News](https://i1.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/Bose-Soundlink-Revolve-Portable-Bluetooth-Speaker-
Charge-Port-and-Built-In-Handle.jpg?fit=1024%2C1024&ssl=1)
](https://amzn.to/31E83ao) #3 Best Portable Bluetooth Speaker: Bose SoundLink
Revolve+

[ __ See on Amazon.com ](https://amzn.to/31xlTLO)

![Superior Digital News | News, Reviews, and Deals on the best technology for
health, fitness, and fun](https://i2.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/06/Divider-SHORT-Circuit-Lines-SD-
News-3-07.png?fit=1024%2C17&ssl=1)

## Wildcard: Crave Curve

### Portable Bluetooth Speaker

[ ![Crave-Curve-Premium-Portable-Bluetooth-
Speaker](https://i2.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/Crave-Curve-Premium-Portable-Bluetooth-
Speaker.jpg?fit=1024%2C554&ssl=1)
](https://cravedirect.com/collections/earphones/products/curve-
speaker?rfsn=4245758.2c31ad) Crave Curve Premium Portable Bluetooth Speaker

> _**10 Hours of playback**_

## PROS:

  * Beautiful aluminum finish gives it a premium look and feel
  * 20W power and 90Hz-20,000Hz frequency range puts out crisp and clear audio, even at higher volumes
  * Bluetooth pairing is very quick, especially after initial pairing with device
  * 10 Hours of playback
  * Full control of music with speaker control buttons; skip songs forward and back by long pressing volume buttons

## CONS:

  * No water and dust-resistance rating displayed on the specs list
  * Aluminum finish is susceptible to scratches and dents
  * Only going down to 90Hz frequency response cuts off a lot of bass if you listen to Hip Hop, R&B, and other Pop music

## Conclusion

Compared to the other portable Bluetooth speakers on our list, the Crave Curve
is a little more delicate. The beautiful aluminum finish will definitely show
some wear-and-tear over time, if you want to throw it in your backpack like
the JBL Charge 4 and Beats Pill+. On the other hand, the Curve serves as the
perfect office, RV, or bookshelf speaker. The audio quality is comparable to
the [**_JBL Flip series_**](https://amzn.to/3eAizFA), so there’s no sacrifice
when it comes to sound output.

We don’t recommend outdoor use with the Curve since we aren’t given water and
dust-resistance ratings, so keep it away from the weather. The built-in mic
makes the perfect office assistant for conference calls, Zoom meetings, and
Facetime. In true Crave fashion, the minimalist design fits with virtually any
style and gives it a professional look. If you’re not familiar with the Crave
brand, they offer many different mobile accessories.

[ Get 10% OFF And FREE SHIPPING @ Crave.com  
USE CODE: SDN10
](https://cravedirect.com/collections/earphones/products/curve-
speaker?rfsn=4245758.2c31ad)

[ ![Crave Curve - Premium Sound
Quality](https://i1.wp.com/superiordigitalnews.com/wp-
content/uploads/2019/09/Crave-Curve-Premium-Sound-
Quality.jpg?fit=1024%2C903&ssl=1)
](https://cravedirect.com/collections/earphones/products/curve-
speaker?rfsn=4245758.2c31ad) Crave Curve - Premium Sound Quality
